description: Section action menu and keyboard feedback - Consolidate section actions into dropdown menu and improve keyboard interaction visibility with blink feedback

userStories.title: Create section dropdown menu component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a reusable dropdown menu component for section actions.
acceptanceCriteria: Create SectionDropdown component in src/components/SectionDropdown.tsx
Component has open/close state managed internally
Menu renders with z-index higher than control strip (z-30 or higher)
Clicking outside the menu closes it
Menu items are rendered as text buttons (not icons)
Component accepts children or items prop for menu content
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add dropdown trigger to section header
userStories.description: As a user, I want to access section actions via a dropdown arrow next to the section name.
acceptanceCriteria: Add dropdown arrow (▼ or similar) inline immediately after section name
Arrow is visually lightweight but clearly clickable
Clicking arrow opens the SectionDropdown menu
Remove standalone export/download button from SectionHeader
Remove standalone enable/disable toggle button from SectionHeader
Dropdown remains accessible at all zoom levels
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Implement dropdown menu content with actions
userStories.description: As a user, I want the dropdown menu to show available actions and keyboard shortcut hints.
acceptanceCriteria: Menu shows keyboard shortcut number at top (e.g., 'Shortcut: 1')
Menu shows 'Download' action item
Menu shows 'Enable' or 'Disable' text based on current section.enabled state
Clicking 'Download' triggers export flow and closes menu
Clicking 'Enable/Disable' toggles section state and closes menu
Menu closes after any action is clicked
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Move keyboard badge to left marker position
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see the keyboard number near the left marker of each section.
acceptanceCriteria: Keyboard number badge (1-9) displayed next to left marker's delete (×) icon
Badge styled as small key cap (background + number, like a keyboard key)
Badge is smaller than marker controls but clearly readable
Position is consistent relative to left marker across all sections
Only enabled sections display a keyboard number badge
Remove keyboard badge from SectionHeader component
Numbers update immediately when sections are enabled/disabled
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add keyboard press blink animation
userStories.description: As a user, I want visual confirmation when I press a keyboard shortcut to play a section.
acceptanceCriteria: Pressing number key (1-9) causes corresponding keyboard badge to blink/highlight
Animation is a short pulse effect (~200-300ms) using opacity or color change
Animation is noticeable but not distracting
Only the section mapped to the pressed key shows the blink
Blink only occurs for enabled sections (disabled sections show no feedback)
Animation triggers immediately on keypress, decoupled from playback state
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
